Text: Thank you for South African content!

Thank you for the upload 

This guy (Trevor Noah) is one of South Africa's finest young comedians. He's head on tactic with ways of SA politics is excellent this would be a must see for everyone

Please guys, if you like his work, buy it!  This man deserves every penny for his humour...if you are struggling to find his stuff online, go to kalahari.com and you should be able to find everything.
I confess! I went to buy both is current DVDs, but they're all sold out :( This will do for now, but I will most definitely get me his DVDs!
